alert.note: Alert for Butler; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 12:53AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LOGAN...NORTHWESTERN SIMPSON...SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER AND NORTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1152 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Dunmor, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Auburn, Lewisburg, Rochester, Insco, Huntsville, Spa, Dimple, Epleys and Leetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
